prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a handsome young man, intense determined blue eyes, medium-length, layered, spiky lavender colored hair, wearing a worn denim capsule corp jacket, leather sword strap
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin texture, highly detailed texture on denim and leather materials, subtle weathering on face
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, low quality, blurry denim
